text:
Saya bersama keluarga berkunjung ke Tasikmalaya, karena anak saya akan bersekolah di salah satu PTN di Tasikmalaya. Kami sekeluarga memesan dua kamar via traveloka. 
Kondisi pertama kali tiba disana, posisi parkiran dan lobi posisi nya menanjak. Tetapi untuk lobi, cukup mewah karena nuansa kuning keemasan. 
Pada saat check in ternyata kamar yang saya pesan belum ada, karena info receptionisnya voucher kamar kami belum ada. 
Kami menunggu sebentar di kursi lobi, sambil menunggu voucher kami ada. 
Sekitar 10menit voucher belum ada juga, tetapi receptionis yang bernama mas hendra membantu proses check in terlebih dahulu, dan saya dibantu proses check in . 
Ternyata kamar kami di batalkan oleh traveloka dengan alasan kamar tidak tersedia, padahal kami pesan sudah full payment. 
Saya juga dibantu oleh mas hendra membetulan pesanan saya, yang pada akhirnya di refund. 
Saya juga alhamdulillah dikasih rate khusus karena hal tersebut dari hotel. 
Untuk kamar kondisi baik dan bersebelahan, kolam renang view nya bagus karena di lantai 8.
Staff ramah,. 
Terima kasih mas hendra, terima kasih horison atas pelayanan nya 
Kapan" Menginap lagi disana, sekalian jenguk anak.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
"Iconic Hotel", Demikian tagline yang saya dengar dari Front Officer Hotel, yang menyambut kami saat kami menikmati staycation di hari spesial saya hari ini (walaupun tagline tersebut sebenarnya mungkin bukan berangkat dari pertanyaan Apa keunggulan Hotel ini, namun lebih kepada password Wifi 🤭). Jujur, kesan Iconic yang saya dapat dari pengalaman kami menginap disini adalah lebih kepada Hospitality dan kearifan lokal dari budaya Sunda yang sangat terasa dari para stafnya. Mulai dari Front Officer, Marketing Officer, Security dan OB yang melayani dengan sangat ramah. 
Sedangkan simbol yang ikoniknya adalah adanya "Kelom Geulis" yang merupakan ikonnya kota Tasikmalaya.

Kami mendapat kamar Junior Suite termasuk BF untuk 2 orang dewasa. Kamar cukup besar dan bersih, Amenities yang komplit, bahkan lebih dari sekelasnya, toiletries juga sangat komplit. Sore harinya, saya mendapatkan kejutan luar biasa: Birthday Cake yang enak banget, dibawakan oleh FO dan bahkan dinyanyikan lagu Happy Birthday. Really Amazed me. Secara keseluruhan, skor 9/10 untuk kamar.

Lanjut Breakfast: Pilihan makanan disini cukup banyak. Mulai dari makanan tradisional dan minuman tradisional yang mungkin jarang didengar: Wedang alang; menu utama, hingga makanan kecil yang variatif tersedia disini dan proses refill dari setiap makanan yang hampir habis pun cukup cepat. 9/10 untuk pengalaman breakfast 👍👍.

Terakhir, sedikit saran saja, semoga proses renovasi yang saya lihat di bagian skylounge tadi siang dapat berlangsung lebih masif dan menyeluruh khususnya kepada fasilitas yang sudah perlu diganti seperti bathtub, lantai dan perawatan kolam renang serta fasilitas lainnya.

Demikian sharing dan review Hotel Horison Tasikmalaya, yang benar-benar menjadi Iconic Hotel di Tasikmalaya karena memberikan kesan mendalam dan menjadi memori indah di hari istimewa saya
title: Iconic Hotel In Tasikmalaya

text:
Saya menginap pada tanggal 6 s.d 8 juli 2020 di kamar tipe Deluxe twin bed kamar nomer 327, berikut ulasan saya:

1. Lokasi

Lokasi berada di tengah kota tasikmalaya. Di sekitar hotel banyak warung makan dan kalau malam banyak penjual kaki lima. Cukup mudah menemukan hotel ini, disamping hotel ini juga ada hotel bintang 3 terkenal lainnya. Lalu lintas depan Hotel juga cukup ramai lancar. Tidak jauh dari alun-alun tasikmalaya. 

2. Fasilitas

Fasilitas hotel ini antara lain:

- tempat parkir, yang cukup memadai karena mempunyai basement untuk parkir. Tapi sayang tempat drop off di depan Loby cukup sempit. 
- restaurant, karena masa pandemi tidak dibuka. Tapi mereka mempunyai room service yang siap menyajikan makanan dan minuman yang kita pesan. 
- free wifi di semua area hotel. 
- ada meeting room
- mempunyai 2 buah lift yang sayangnya pas kami datang 1 buah lift dimatikan sehingga kalau ada tamu datang membuat menunggu. 
- mempunyai fasilitas room yang non smoking dan smoking.
- ada swimming pool di rooftop hotel 

3. Bedroom

Kamar  deluxe tidak begitu luas tapi cukup untuk berdua, mempunyai luas sekitar 23meter persegi. Fasilitas kamar cukup lengkap, antara lain:

- ac yang bekerja dengan baik mengeluarkan hawa dingin
- TV Led yang mempunyai tv kabel
- teko pemanas air yang dilengkapi kopi/teh
- kasur yang cukup empuk
- kemudian ada kursi kerja
- stop contact ada disebelah kasur
- lemari pakaian

Untuk kamar mandi cukup tidak teralu sempit dan bersih. Ada shower yang bekerja dengan baik mengeluarkan air panas/dingin.

4. Service

- untuk proses c.in dan c.out cukup cepat. 
- tidak ada tukang parkir yang membantu parkirkan mobil di basement.
- tidak ada welcome drink
- pada hari kedua saya datang dari urusan kantor pada sore hari, tapi kamar saya belum dibersihkan, saya telp receptionist sampe 4 kali baru datang yang membersihkan kamar. 

5. Food and Beverage

Untuk breakfast karena sesuai anjuran pemerintah di dalam mas pandemi makanan harus di anter ke kamar.

Saya memilih nasi goreng, teh dan buah. 
Untuk rasa biasa saja tidak istimewa, tapi yg membuat saya kecewa paha ayam goreng nya sangat kecil 2 kali gigit juga habis. Untuk harga kamar sekitar 450rban menurut saya kurang worthed sarapannya. Toh di masa pandemi cost buat breakfast yang biasanya buffet dialihkan ke kamar sudab cukup membantu. Jadi sudah selayaknya sarapannya lbh istimewa. 

Overall rating:

Saya untuk dinas mungkin akan kembali lagi ke horison hotel. Tapi kalau masih masa pandemi lebih baik baik saya membeli room only soalnya lebih baim sarapan di luar hotel saja.

text:
Saya dan keluarga  bermalam di Horison Tasikmalaya minggu lalu,pelayan dari semua staff nya sangat luarbiasa, receptionist sangat ramah, kami diberikan connecting room sesuai dengan permintaan kami.

Kamar cukup luas dengan furniture design yang modern minimalis atau mungkin rustik design concept yang membuat suasana menjadi hangat.

Breakfast varian cukup lengkap, beberapa sajian tradisional khas setempat disajikan dengan baik dengan rasa yang luarbiasa enak.

Kolam renang cukup luas dengan pemandangan kota Tasikmalaya yang ramah dan sedikit sejuk membuat anak saya betah bermain air.

Pengalaman saya dan keluarga menginap satu malam membuat kami mempunyai kesan hommy.

Terimakasih pak Asep sebagai General Manager atas pelayanan seluruh staff nya yang luarbiasa.

Kami akan datang lagi ke kampung halaman saya suatu saat dengan menginap dihotel ini.
title: Pengalaman menginap yang luarbiasa!

text:
Sebuah hotel baru yang ada di Tasikmalaya.

Secara keseluruhan hotel ini cukup baik apalagi memegang nama yang sudah terkenal.

Hotel ini memiliki fasilitas kolam renang, gym dan tentunya restoran. Kolam renang tidak terlalu besar. Untuk menu sarapan cukup bervariasi, dan mengenai rasa tidak terlalu istimewa.

Menurut pendapat pribadi, ada kekurangan yang saya rasa cukup mengganggu/menjengkelkan, yaitu toilet duduk yg cukup sempit, merepotkan jika yg ingin menggunakan orangnya besar atau tinggi, susah untuk memposisikan kaki, karena terhalang tembok dan kaca kamar mandi. Selain itu, pemberian kunci kamar yang hanya 1 cukup merepotkan jika penghuni kamar ingin keluar hotel dgn tujuan berbeda, atau jika ingin pergi ke lantai kamar, harus meminta pertolongan petugas front office untuk memilih lantai pada lift. Alasan tidak bisa memberikan kunci karena tamu hotel penuh (?). Sebuah alasan aneh untuk hotel yg memiliki nama besar.

saya dengar di tasikmalaya ada hotel baru,kebetulan saya mampir di kota tasik,saya langsung booking 2 kamar ,hotel baru di pusat kota tasikmalaya,staff depan ramah dan sangat membantu,petugas di pintu depan juga cekatan,kita turun dari mobil,langsung di sambut dengan ramah,koper" juga langsung mereka angkat.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I visited this city in my trip back from Cilacap to Jakarta. It's already passed 6 p.m. and I didn't have any reservation since it's an urgent matter. The hotel  that I intended to stay was full, so with the quick search through internet I found this hotel, exactly located by the main street. With pure luck, there's still a room for me to stay here with my family, although it's smoking room, and I could still smell the smoke when I got in. The reception was quick enough to process our check-in. And then they served us welcome drink, hot ginger tea. It was delicious. I was even allowed to take another cup to the room. 

The room was decent and clean. The bathroom was also clean. The ambiance there was really cozy and it really eased us after such a long trip. We all really had a good night sleep here. The breakfast was also good, although some of them need improvement in taste. They had several local delicacies and also variety of sambal. 

They also have a nice pool here, but I didn't dip in since I was in a hurry. However, this short encounter really left a mark. The staff was helpful and nice, especially Mr. Yanto, who helped me with my lugage when I first checked in. He was super nice! Great job! I hope they all always keep up the good work.
title: Great Comfort in a Small City

text:
I have visited Tasikmalaya regularly for family matter, and the new opening Horison Tasikmalaya has given us an alternative of stay in this small and warm city. Not so many national chained hotel in Tasikmalaya and the opening of Horison has given visitors a good warm stay. 
Horison Tasikmalaya is located on Yudanagara street (one of the main street in the city) and situated surrounding the city central, we can reach the grand mosque in a few hundred meters and also the local traditional market. If you enjoy walking, then you can circle around the city centre within 1-1.5 hour only.
As the new hotel, Horison Tasikmalaya, is offering an excellent service with of course all new infrastructures. Guests are offered with compliment of mini bar and an exquisite afternoon tea.
I have stayed in this hotel for a few times and enjoying junior suite and superior room, with the priviledge of enjoying excellent service, new furniture and other all new stuffs. since the pre-opening (Nov-2016), we are welcome with warmth by Mr. Anggi (Front Office personnel) and always care with our requests and concerns.

Enjoy Tasikmalaya with your stay at Horison.........
title: A new coming hotel in town (Tasikmalaya) will welcome you with warmth......

text:
Came to Tasikmalaya for urgent matter arrive on 2am with exhausted body and mind. We had accident in the road need immediate rest but the check in process is very long time for me because the room is not ready due problem with the celling and water leaked from the swimming pool they say. 

Service : **
Very long check in process

Room : ****
Good bed, clean room and free snack include.

Staff : ***
Night staff : Polite, helpful make hot tea when we wait for the preparation of room. But again its because the problem with the room we need to wait long time to get our room for rest.

Morning staff : on the check out some think funny happens we valet our car in the night so basically expected the car is pick up by the parking staff since we don't know where the parking space but the receptionist is give back our key when we ask for our car..... need to ask her to tell the parking staff for pick up our car to lobby. 

Facility : *
the pool is dirty in the morning see photo attached. Slow internet WiFi.

Breakfast food : **
I don't feel any special food in the breakfast buffet.

Value for money : **
Well got the room from traveloka for almost idr 450k each room on very late booking but the service and hotel facility is below standard.
title: Bad check in impression

text: We visit this new hotel for the new year eve celebration. Location and building is nice but i dont like how the way the reception treating us. Probably the worst i've had during my travel. Can't even get a second key to my room.... Blah...
title: Reception is worst

text:
My first impression when I walk in to the hotel room is spacious, but a bit dusty, judging from the smell. Maybe because this hotel is new, so you get the new renovated room smell like. Other than that, it's nice. You get, fridge, hot water pot, tea, sugar, coffee.  Also you get free snacks, yeay! You don't get this often :). They also gave you 4 bottles of complementary mineral water. Next, just like any new designed hotel, you won't find any wardrobe. Just shelf-like wardrobe, which I doubt will be be good enough if you stay more than 3 days.  
The shower is clean and no issue with water heater. They have hair dryer. But no exhaust fan. I assumed they forgot to install it, because I checked, the other room has exhaust fan. No soap dish for hand soap, and they don't put coaster under the glasses. 
The pool is good. Not big, but it has a nice view and large pool benches.
The staffs are friendly and helpful.
Breakfast are various but mostly traditional food.  I like traditional food, so I have no complaint here :). The food tasted good.
The staffs are friendly and helpful. They are helpful with children.
Shopping mall and restaurants are just few minutes walk. And less than 15 minutes to the train station by car.
I will definitely stay here again if I have the chance :)
title: Another good hotel to choose in Tasikmalaya

text: Nice hotel in the city center. Spacious rooms, equipped with soft beds, hot water showers in the rooms. Very friendly staff. Average price. Furniture medium wear. With cleanliness there are no problems, cleaning every day, without requests and reminders.
title: Good quality hotel in Tasik City Center

text:
first time we arrived at the hotel, the lobby was nice and clean. we stayed at the junior suite room, the room was quiet big and spacious, there is a sofa, and bath tub to entertain your kid. 
But the bed sheet was dirty, i found this yellow stained at my bed sheets.
The pool was small and crowded.
The staff was nice and polite, only one staff lady wearing white uniform holding walkie talkie which made me uncomfortable (i know there's an event at the pool that day) but come on there was only 2 people at the elevator (the staff and a lady) and she stopped me to get in the eevator when the elevator door was open (we waited at the lobby hotel together to get in the elevator) and she asked me to use the other elevator to go to my room,it was 10.++ pm at night, i'm with my 3 yo child who was tired at that time, and the lift was empty🤔😑😑 It still pissed me off when i remember it.
Breakfast was ok, I only tried the main food.O ya, I think the staff need to check the salad plates, because there's a lot like a tiny bug around the vegetable.
title: New hotel

text: In the midtown of Tasikmalaya, surrounded by culinary outlets with great service and atmosphere. New hotel with friendly staff and more facilities compare to other hotel with same level. Easy to find some midnight foodies. Family enjoying the rooftop pool terrace with amazing view of Mount Galunggung an Tasik City.
title: Midnight in Tasik

text: It was great, one of the nicest experiences. The hotel is near the public transportation. The front office greeted and offered welcome drink. The room is clean and spacious. Toiletries and hair dryer are provided. They even have a mini fridge in the room. Plenty of choices were available during breakfast time. Their kitchen is open 24/7 so it's easier to order food from your room rather than to go out, they're tasty and affordable. One of their staffs, Mr. Yon, is a wonderful person. He greeted me during my breakfast, asked about the food whether they're fine or if there's any suggestion, and how's my stay so far. He also informed me about the 8th floor and suggested me to go there. He also helped me to get there. It's Sky8 where there's a rooftop lounge and swimming pool. I enjoyed my short stay there. Thank you for the warm hospitality.
title: Horison Tasikmalaya

text:
During my visit to Tasikmalaya my colleague recommend this hotel. Below is  my personal view about the hotel:

Check In and Out
The staff were very helpful and help me through the process very fast thou I did not made a reservation. Same goes to check out process.

The Room
Very standard, I got the room were air conditioner is not working well. Made a complain and the technician came to room to fix the AC but not really do any good. Bed is not really comfy but that's okay. Bathroom is small and amenities is limited. TV is available but the channel is not much and picture quality is low.

Breakfast
Taste is just fine, need improvement. Food variety is also need more improvement. The restaurant space is limited and crowded.

In Summary
Not value for money, however in this town not many choice of good and decent hotel available so this may become one of the good one.
title: My first time in Tasikmalaya

text:
I stayed at Junior Suite Room this time and feel so happy with this choice.
The Room is very big even for me who stayed alone (35m2), but the atmosphere of the room is still feel warm and cozy, with comfortable and big sofa + balcony, it was my best choice of luck at this time.
For me Horison Tasik is my 1st option to stay whenever i come to Tasik, either for business or holiday trip.
This hotel have a very good design, luxurious lobby, nice and helpfull staff,
Facility ok (gym), nice rooftop swimming pool + rooftop bar for relaxing after hectic day
Breakfast very good and also the amenities is awesome
Beyond expectation of just a 3 stars hotel
Definitely i will go back again!
title: My Junior Suite Room Review

text:
The best hotel by far in Tasikmalaya!! From the moment you enter until you leave everything is as you would wish for and this is certainly not the case in other star rated hotels in Tasik.
Good location in the city centre, Alun-Alun. Room was well equipped, bright and even had a balcony (although the city views may not be of picture postcard value).
But staff were what made this stay so good from the door attendants, through reception up to including the GM, Pak Asep (who was everywhere!). nothing was a problem including my never-ending need for strong coffee in the morning (and it should be noted that Tasikmalaya is a dry, alcohol free city).
The Horizon Hotel will now, hopefully, force other establishments to raise their current mediocre standards to compete.
title: Great Location, Good Room and Outstanding staff.

text: Relatively new, which is the main reason I chose this hotel, and conveniently located in the city centre. Other than those there is not much else. The overpriced ‘junior suite’ is basically a bigger room, with a ‘free minibar’ consisting of 2 tetrapacks of tea & two packs of snacks with a total value of USD1.00 (yes, one US dollar equivalent for the drink & snack, no wonder they are free) if you buy them at the nearby shop. Breakfast mainly consist of Indonesian fares, with very limited choice on breads. Wifi is very slow, even my celular connection is faster by far. Just ok for an overnight business trip, but choose the standard rooms for a better value.
title: perhaps one of the better ones in the city, but nothing is really above average
